content.en: Privacy-preserving association mining: Researchers have been exploring ways to balance data confidentiality and user needs in association rule mining. They have proposed various algorithms, such as data mining and machine learning algorithms, blocking techniques, and fuzzification of support and confidence, to hide sensitive association rules in binary data sets. Additionally, algorithms like ISL, DSR, and a hybrid approach combining ISL and DSR have been developed for automatic hiding of informative association rule sets. These algorithms aim to improve privacy preservation and knowledge discovery in association patterns mining.
content.da: Privatlivsbevarende associationsmining: Forskere har undersøgt måder at balancere datakonfidentialitet og brugerbehov i associationsregelmining. De har foreslået forskellige algoritmer, såsom datamining og maskinlæringsalgoritmer, blokeringsteknikker og sløring af support og tillid, for at skjule følsomme associationsregler i binære datasæt. Desuden er algoritmer som ISL, DSR og en hybridtilgang, der kombinerer ISL og DSR, blevet udviklet til automatisk skjulning af informative associationsregelsæt. Disse algoritmer sigter mod at forbedre privatlivsbevaring og vidensopdagelse i associationsmønster-mining.
